wathman aanduwe adhyapana prathipaththiya wana adhyapanaya wikinime prathipaththiya kriyathmaka kirima udesa sidu karagena yanu labana adhyapana paudgalikaranaya, prathipadana kappaduwa hethuwen me wanawita wishwawidyala shishya prajawata, demapiyan ha pasal sisu sisuwiyanta muhuna pamata siduwana pidawa waha nawathwiya yuthu bawath, nidahas adhyapanaya surakina bawata boru porondu dun aanduwa me wanawita elipitama adhyapanaya wikinime katayuththa sidu karagena yana bawath, idiriyedi anthar wishwawidyalayiya shishya balamandalaya yatathe diwayine siyalu wishwawidyala, wruththiya samithi, bahujana sanwidhana eekabaddha karagath satanak aarambha karana bawa rajarata wishwawidyalaye maha shishya sangamaye sabhapathi dinesh kumara sahodaraya adahas dakwamin pawasiya.

ekaeka disthrikkawala indan mithrayo awith thaman disthrikawala karapu kiyapu dewal bedahadaganna kota kalaya yanawa therune na.lokuma pudume une yamtham kadikadi sinhalen kathakarapu ape shanmugam disthrik puhunuwedi hodinma sinhala kathakaranna igena gena thibimayi.kohomin kohoma hari hawasweddi okkoma polis skoleta wartha kara.pirimi serama jeshyata niladhari newasikagarayeth gahanu kandayamata wenath thanakath nawathan sapayuwa.hawasa wishesha sancharayak thiyala polis widyalaya athulatha sthana penwadun polis adhikariwarayek upades dunna heta aluyama 5.30 kridanganayata siyalu dena paminiya yuthu bawata.perawaru 7.00 dakwa saririka abhyasa wadasatahana pawathwena bawath in anathuruwa pe wa 8.00deshana aarambha wana bawath welawa ta eeta sahabhagiwima athyawashya bawatath upades dunna.rathri 10.00nindata yayuthubawatath upades dunna.methek kisidawasaka athdakapu nathi kalasatahanakata anugatha wenna wima gana kathakarala rathri nidagaththa.
